moves.name: Fissure
moves.description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target instantly faints if it hits.

moves.name: Flail
moves.description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

moves.name: Mud Sport
moves.description: The user covers itself with mud. It weakens Electric-type moves while the user is in the battle.

moves.name: Bide
moves.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

moves.name: Thunder Shock
moves.description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Mud Shot
moves.description: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. It also reduces the target's Speed.

moves.name: Camouflage
moves.description: The user's type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water's edge, in grass, or in a cave.

moves.name: Mud Bomb
moves.description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Discharge
moves.description: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike the area around the user. It may also cause paralysis.

moves.name: Endure
moves.description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Bounce
moves.description: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target on the second turn. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Muddy Water
moves.description: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the opposing team. It may also lower the targets' accuracy.

moves.name: Thunderbolt
moves.description: A strong electric blast is loosed at the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Revenge
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

moves.name: Flail
moves.description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

moves.name: Fissure
moves.description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target instantly faints if it hits.
